name: O / >
description:
O / > - A game created for the A Game by It's Cover 2017 game jam. This is a game based on the RPS case design.

Also submitted for the Corona/Defold jam (out of competition)

Made with Defold (Community Page)

Code and original idea by Björn Ritzl

Art and game design ideas by ShroomArts

RELEASE NOTES

2017-09-28 - Uploaded bugfix version based on player feedback. No new features or other changes.
